statements: UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 100.50, description = 'Payment Received' WHERE transaction_id = 'f4ec99c0-a4d3-4c70-b268-e541ead16f72';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET description = 'Refund Initiated', amount = 55.25 WHERE transaction_id = 'b1869513-730a-48b5-86d3-f9b879cd50cd';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.25 WHERE transaction_id = 'a9f1fafe-4512-4aa5-89dd-93e1c22121c4';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET description = 'Payment for services' WHERE account_id = 'e451ca88-7e60-4a78-8137-39d8d94c80c3';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE fraudulent_accounts SET balance = 1000.00, last_activity_date = '2023-01-20 15:45:00' WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE fraudulent_accounts SET balance = 5000.75, last_activity_date = '2022-01-20', account_name = 'John Doe' WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE targets SET status = 'completed' WHERE target_id = 98765;
UPDATE transactions SET description = 'Payment for services' WHERE transaction_id = 100
UPDATE targets SET status = 'Closed', account_id = 200 WHERE target_id = 10
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE targets SET last_interaction = '2022-05-10 08:00:00' WHERE target_id = 3;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 5000, description = 'Large transaction' WHERE timestamp > '2021-09-01';
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 1000, owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = 500.00 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 75.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 500 WHERE account_id = 1000;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 1500.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE account_id = 2000;
